item.title: Work song
item.description: Work song # shanty, chantey, or chanty # is a genre of traditional folk song that was once commonly sung as a work song to accompany rhythmical labor aboard large merchant sailing vessels.

item.title: What do Chinese people REALLY MEAN when they send Emoji?
item.description: What do Chinese people REALLY MEAN when they send Emoji? # Short video on the differences between European and Chinese cultures through the lens of emoji. And another one about Chinese language
